SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT360
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Single Currency Interest Rate Derivative Confirmation
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is exchanged by or on behalf of the institutions or corporates, party A and party B, which have agreed to a single currency interest rate swap, a cap, a collar or a floor. The confirmed transaction is covered by a BBAIRS (British Bankers' Association Interest Rate Swap), ISDA (International Swaps and Derivatives Association), Deutscher Rahmenvertrag fur Finanztermingeschafte or AFB (Association Francaise de Banques) Master Agreement.
The message also covers deals which are not part of an ISDA, AFB, Deutscher Rahmenvertrag fur Finanztermingeschafte or BBAIRS Master. In this case, party A and party B must have another bilateral agreement in place.
This message may also be sent by a money broker to the two parties (party A and party B) for which the broker arranged the deal.
If there are two money brokers involved in arranging a deal between party A and party B, this message is also exchanged between these money brokers.
The MT 360 may be used to:
a) confirm the details of a new transaction between the parties b) correct a previously sent confirmation c) cancel a previously sent confirmation. d) report the details of a transaction to a trade repository.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent message with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 360 previously sent -or- to correct error(s) in an MT 360 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent message. Used to cancel an MT 360 previously sent -or- to cancel an MT 360 which contains erroneous information.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Duplicates the same previously sent confirmation.Used to inform the Receiver that a confirmation was already sent by telex, fax or SWIFT

Code.Name: NEWT
Code.Description: New confirmation.Used to send the MT 360 for the first time -or- to send a corrected MT 360 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 360 with function CANC.

Validation.Comment: Scope must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: bilateral confirmation, ie, Sender and Receiver are the principals

Code.Name: BROK
Code.Description: confirmation is sent by a money broker

Validation.Comment: Type of Swap must be specified using one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47):

Code.Name: CAPBUYER
Code.Description: Party A buys the cap and pays the premium.

Code.Name: CAPSELLER
Code.Description: Party A sells the cap and receives the premium.

Code.Name: COLLARBYER
Code.Description: Party A buys the collar and pays the premium.

Code.Name: COLLARSLLR
Code.Description: Party A sells the collar and receives the premium.

Code.Name: FLOORBUYER
Code.Description: Party A buys the floor and pays the premium.

Code.Name: FLOORSLLER
Code.Description: Party A sells the floor and receives the premium.

Code.Name: FIXEDFIXED
Code.Description: IRS where both parties pay fixed rates.

Code.Name: FIXEDFLOAT
Code.Description: IRS where Party A pays fixed and receives floating rates.

Code.Name: FLOATFIXED
Code.Description: IRS where Party A pays floating and receives fixed rates.

Code.Name: FLOATFLOAT
Code.Description: IRS where both parties pay floating rates.

Validation.Comment: Settlement Method must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T48):

Code.Name: GROSS
Code.Description: All due amounts are to be paid in full.

Code.Name: NET
Code.Description: All due amounts are to be netted, resulting in a single payment when due dates coincide.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Convention must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: FOLLOWING
Code.Description: The non-business date will be adjusted to the first following day that is a business day.

Code.Name: MODIFIEDF
Code.Description: The non-business date will be adjusted to the first following day that is a business day unless that day falls in the next calendar month, in which case that date will be the first preceding day that is a business day.

Code.Name: OTHER
Code.Description: the Business Day Convention is specified in field 77D.

Code.Name: PRECEDING
Code.Description: The non-business date will be adjusted to the first preceding day that is a business day.

Validation.Comment: Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03).
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code) (Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78).

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Indicator must contain the following code (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The deal being confirmed is not included in a collateral agreement.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The deal being confirmed is included in a collateral agreement.

Option.Name: H
Option.Description: Type, Date, Version of the Agreement

Validation.Comment: Type must be specified using one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47):

Code.Name: OTHER
Code.Description: Another type of bilateral agreement signed up front between party A and party B. The agreement must be specified in field 77D.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).

Code.Name: Y

Code.Description: The Day Count Fraction is specified in field 37N in the same sequence.

Validation.Comment: One of the following codes must be used in Side Indicator (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: C
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the client leg.

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the Central Counterparty (CCP) leg

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The contract is below the clearing threshold

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The contract is above the clearing threshold

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):
The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39)
Sign ([N]) must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14).
The following code must be used (Error code(s): T36):

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 14A consists of code OTHER, field 77D must be present (Error code(s): D35)."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 1 of field 77H consists of code OTHER, field 77D must be present (Error code(s): D36)."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, if field 14A consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D55)."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, if field 14A consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D55)."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence E, if field 14A consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D55)."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-4
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F, if field 14A consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D55)."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, if field 14D consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D37)."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, if field 14D consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D37)."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence E, if field 14D consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D37)."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-4
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F, if field 14D consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D37)."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, if field 14F consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D38)."

fieldvalidation.name: C5-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F, if field 14F consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D38)."

fieldvalidation.name: C6-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, if field 14J consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D39)."

fieldvalidation.name: C6-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F, if field 14J consists of code OTHER, field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D39)."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, if Frequency of field 14G consists of code 'O', field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D40)."

fieldvalidation.name: C7-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F, if Frequency of field 14G consists of code 'O', field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D40)."

fieldvalidation.name: C8-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, if Period of field 38E consists of code 'O', field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D41)."

fieldvalidation.name: C8-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F, if Period of field 38E consists of code 'O', field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D41)."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-1A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, if Period From or Period To of field 38G or field 38H consists of code 'O', field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D42)."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-1B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, if Period From or Period To of field 38G or field 38H consists of code 'O', field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D42)."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-2A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F, if Period From or Period To of field 38G or field 38H consists of code 'O', field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D42)."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-2B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F, if Period From or Period To of field 38G or field 38H consists of code 'O', field 37N must be present in that sequence (Error code(s): D42)."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C10: The presence of the fixed and floating legs and the additional amount to be paid, depends on the type of transaction, the additional amount in this case being the premium paid for a cap, floor or collar. Thus, depending on the code value in sequence A, field 23A Type of Swap, only the following combinations of the optional sequences B, C, E, F, L and M are allowed (Error code(s): D58).
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23A[0].Type_of_Swap == "FIXEDFIXED", B.$size > 0 && C.$size == 0 && E.$size > 0 && F.$size == 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A is FIXEDFIXED, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence B is mandatory, b) Sequence C is not allowed, c) Sequence E is mandatory and d) Sequence F is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-2
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23A[0].Type_of_Swap == "FLOATFLOAT", B.$size == 0 && C.$size > 0 && E.$size == 0 && F.$size > 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A is FLOATFLOAT, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence B is not allowed, b) Sequence C is mandatory, c) Sequence E is not allowed and d) Sequence F is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-3
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23A[0].Type_of_Swap == "FLOATFIXED", B.$size > 0 && C.$size == 0 && E.$size == 0 && F.$size > 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A is FLOATFIXED, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence B is mandatory, b) Sequence C is not allowed, c) Sequence E is not allowed and d) Sequence F is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-4
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23A[0].Type_of_Swap == "FIXEDFLOAT", B.$size == 0 && C.$size > 0 && E.$size > 0 && F.$size == 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A is FIXEDFLOAT, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence B is not allowed, b) Sequence C is mandatory, c) Sequence E is mandatory and d) Sequence F is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-5
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23A[0].Type_of_Swap == "CAPBUYER", B.$size == 0 && C.$size > 0 && E.$size == 0 && F.$size == 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A is CAPBUYER, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence B is not allowed, b) Sequence C is mandatory, c) Sequence E is not allowed and d) Sequence F is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-6
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23A[0].Type_of_Swap == "CAPSELLER", B.$size == 0 && C.$size == 0 && E.$size == 0 && F.$size > 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A is CAPSELLER, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence B is not allowed, b) Sequence C is not allowed, c) Sequence E is not allowed and d) Sequence F is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-7
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23A[0].Type_of_Swap == "FLOORBUYER", B.$size == 0 && C.$size > 0 && E.$size == 0 && F.$size == 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A is FLOORBUYER, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence B is not allowed, b) Sequence C is mandatory, c) Sequence E is not allowed and d) Sequence F is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-8
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23A[0].Type_of_Swap == "FLOORSLLER", B.$size == 0 && C.$size == 0 && E.$size == 0 && F.$size > 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A is FLOORSLLER, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence B is not allowed b) Sequence C is not allowed, c) Sequence E is not allowed and d) Sequence F is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-9
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23A[0].Type_of_Swap == "COLLARBYER", B.$size == 0 && C.$size > 0 && E.$size == 0 && F.$size > 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A is COLLARBYER, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence B is not allowed, b) Sequence C is mandatory, c) Sequence E is not allowed and d) Sequence F is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-10
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F23A[0].Type_of_Swap == "COLLARSLLR", B.$size == 0 && C.$size > 0 && E.$size == 0 && F.$size > 0, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A is COLLARSLLR, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence B is not allowed, b) Sequence C is mandatory, c) Sequence E is not allowed and d) Sequence F is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C11
fieldvalidation.comment: C11: In the fixed leg payable by party B, either the fixed amounts are used or the rate and day count fraction. In the latter case, the period end date adjustment indicator must also be present. Thus, when subsequence B1 is used, the presence of fields 32M, 17F and 14D depends on field 37U being present or not as follows (Error code(s): D45).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When subsequence B1 is used, the presence of fields 32M, 17F and 14D depends on field 37U of sequence B being present or not as follows (Error code(s): D45): a) If field 37U of sequence B is present, then in subsequence B1 field 32M is not allowed and fields 17F and 14D are mandatory. b) If field 37U of sequence B is not present, then in subsequence B1 field 32M is mandatory and fields 17F and 14D are not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C12
fieldvalidation.comment: C12: In the fixed leg payable by party A, either the fixed amounts are used or the rate and day count fraction. In the latter case, the period end date adjustment indicator must also be present. Thus, when subsequence E1 is used, the presence of fields 32M, 17F and 14D depends on field 37U being present or not as follows (Error code(s): D59).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When subsequence E1 is used, the presence of fields 32M, 17F and 14D depends on field 37U of sequence E being present or not as follows (Error code(s): D59): a) If field 37U of sequence E is present, then in subsequence E1 field 32M is not allowed and fields 17F and 14D are mandatory. b) If field 37U of sequence E is not present, then in subsequence E1 field 32M is mandatory and fields 17F and 14D are not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C13-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C13: If settlement instructions are used, the receiving agent must be used and the other settlement instructions are optional. Thus, for all occurrences of the fields 53a, 56a and 57a in sequences L or M: the following rules apply (Error code(s): D48).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 57a is present in sequence L, then in the same sequence fields 53a and 56a are optional. If field 57a is not present in sequence L, then in the same sequence fields 53a and 56a are not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C13-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 57a is present in sequence M, then in the same sequence fields 53a and 56a are optional. If field 57a is not present in sequence M, then in the same sequence fields 53a and 56a are not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C14-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The second intermediary field can only be used if two intermediaries are required. Thus, for all occurrences of the fields 56a and 86a, the following rules apply (Error code(s): E35): a) If field 56a is present in sequence D, then in the same sequence field 86a is optional. b) If field 56a is not present in sequence D, then in the same sequence field 86a is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C14-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The second intermediary field can only be used if two intermediaries are required. Thus, for all occurrences of the fields 56a and 86a, the following rules apply (Error code(s): E35): a) If field 56a is present in sequence G, then in the same sequence field 86a is optional. b) If field 56a is not present in sequence G, then in the same sequence field 86a is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C14-3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The second intermediary field can only be used if two intermediaries are required. Thus, for all occurrences of the fields 56a and 86a, the following rules apply (Error code(s): E35): a) If field 56a is present in sequence L, then in the same sequence field 86a is optional. b) If field 56a is not present in sequence L, then in the same sequence field 86a is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C14-4
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The second intermediary field can only be used if two intermediaries are required. Thus, for all occurrences of the fields 56a and 86a, the following rules apply (Error code(s): E35): a) If field 56a is present in sequence M, then in the same sequence field 86a is optional. b) If field 56a is not present in sequence M, then in the same sequence field 86a is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C15-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Only one currency is allowed in the message. Thus, the currency code in all amount fields must be the same (Error code(s): C02)."

fieldvalidation.name: C15-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Only one currency is allowed in the message. Thus, the currency code in all amount fields must be the same (Error code(s): C02)."

fieldvalidation.name: C15-C
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Only one currency is allowed in the message. Thus, the currency code in all amount fields must be the same (Error code(s): C02)."

fieldvalidation.name: C15-D
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Only one currency is allowed in the message. Thus, the currency code in all amount fields must be the same (Error code(s): C02)."

fieldvalidation.name: C15-E
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Only one currency is allowed in the message. Thus, the currency code in all amount fields must be the same (Error code(s): C02)."

fieldvalidation.name: C15-F
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Only one currency is allowed in the message. Thus, the currency code in all amount fields must be the same (Error code(s): C02)."

fieldvalidation.name: C16-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C16: Taking into account C10: If the Floating Rate Option is a post determined (AFB or ISDA) rate then the fixed rate must be used in sequence B or E and the subsequences B1, C1, C2, C3, E1, F1, F2 and F3 must not be used. Thus, the presence of field 37U in sequences B and E and the presence of subsequences B1, C1, C2, C3, E1, F1, F2 and F3 depend on the content of the first subfield of field 77H and on the content of field 14F as follows (Error code(s): E41).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When sequence C is present and sequences B, E and F are not present, if either the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is ISDA and field 14F of sequence C is one of FRF-TAM-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDCCOMP, FRF-TAG-CDC, FRF-TAG-CDCCOMP, FRF-TMP-CDCAVERAG or the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is AFB and field 14F of sequence C is one of FRF-SWAP-AMR, FRF-SWAP-TMP-IF, FRF-SWAP-TMP-M, FRF-SWAP-T4M-AMR, FRF-CAP-TAM, FRF-CAP-T4M, FRF-FLOOR-TAM, FRF-FLOOR-T4M, then subsequences C1, C2 and C3 are not allowed. Otherwise, subsequence C1 is mandatory and subsequences C2 and C3 are optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C16-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When sequence F is present and sequences B, C and E are not present, if either the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is ISDA and field 14F of sequence F is one of FRF-TAM-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDCCOMP, FRF-TAG-CDC, FRF-TAG-CDCCOMP, FRF-TMP-CDCAVERAG or the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is AFB and field 14F of sequence F is one of FRF-SWAP-AMR, FRF-SWAP-TMP-IF, FRF-SWAP-TMP-M, FRF-SWAP-T4M-AMR, FRF-CAP-TAM, FRF-CAP-T4M, FRF-FLOOR-TAM, FRF-FLOOR-T4M, then subsequences F1, F2 and F3 are not allowed. Otherwise subsequence F1 is mandatory and subsequences F2 and F3 are optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C16-3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When sequences B and F are present and sequences C and E are not present, if either the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is ISDA and field 14F of sequence F is one of FRF-TAM-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDCCOMP, FRF-TAG-CDC, FRF-TAG-CDCCOMP, FRF-TMP-CDCAVERAG or the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is AFB and field 14F of sequence F is one of FRF-SWAP-AMR, FRF-SWAP-TMP-IF, FRF-SWAP-TMP-M, FRF-SWAP-T4M-AMR, FRF-CAP-TAM, FRF-CAP-T4M, FRF-FLOOR-TAM, FRF-FLOOR-T4M, then subsequences B1, F1, F2 and F3 are not allowed and field 37U of sequence B is mandatory. Otherwise the following conditions apply: a) Subsequences B1 and F1 are mandatory. b) Subsequences F2 and F3 are optional. C) Field 37U of sequence B is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C16-4
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When sequences C and E are present and sequences B and F are not present, if either the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is ISDA and field 14F of sequence C is one of FRF-TAM-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDCCOMP, FRF-TAG-CDC, FRF-TAG-CDCCOMP, FRF-TMP-CDCAVERAG or the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is AFB and field 14F of sequence C is one of FRF-SWAP-AMR, FRF-SWAP-TMP-IF, FRF-SWAP-TMP-M, FRF-SWAP-T4M-AMR, FRF-CAP-TAM, FRF-CAP-T4M, FRF-FLOOR-TAM, FRF-FLOOR-T4M, then subsequences E1, C1, C2 and C3 are not allowed and field 37U of sequence E is mandatory. Otherwise the following conditions apply: a) Subsequences E1 and C1 are mandatory. b) Subsequences C2 and C3 are optional. C) Field 37U of sequence E is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C16-5
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When sequences B and E are present and sequences C and F are not present, the following conditions apply: a) Subsequences B1 and E1 are mandatory. b) Field 37U of sequence B is optional. c) Field 37U of sequence E is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C16-6A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When sequences C and F are present and sequences B and E are not present, if either the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is ISDA and field 14F of sequence C is one of FRF-TAM-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDCCOMP, FRF-TAG-CDC, FRF-TAG-CDCCOMP, FRF-TMP-CDCAVERAG or the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is AFB and field 14F of sequence C is one of FRF-SWAP-AMR, FRF-SWAP-TMP-IF, FRF-SWAP-TMP-M, FRF-SWAP-T4M-AMR, FRF-CAP-TAM, FRF-CAP-T4M, FRF-FLOOR-TAM, FRF-FLOOR-T4M, then subsequences C1, C2 and C3 are not allowed. Otherwise, subsequence C1 is mandatory and subsequences C2 and C3 are optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C16-6B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When sequences C and F are present and sequences B and E are not present, if either the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is ISDA and field 14F of sequence F is one of FRF-TAM-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDC, FRF-T4M-CDCCOMP, FRF-TAG-CDC, FRF-TAG-CDCCOMP, FRF-TMP-CDCAVERAG or the first subfield of field 77H in sequence A is AFB and field 14F of sequence F is one of FRF-SWAP-AMR, FRF-SWAP-TMP-IF, FRF-SWAP-TMP-M, FRF-SWAP-T4M-AMR, FRF-CAP-TAM, FRF-CAP-T4M, FRF-FLOOR-TAM, FRF-FLOOR-T4M, then subsequences F1, F2 and F3 are not allowed. Otherwise, subsequence F1 is mandatory and subsequences F2 and F3 are optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C17
fieldvalidation.comment: C17: The related reference must be present in the case of an amendment or cancellation. Thus, in sequence A, the presence of field 21 depends on field 22A as follows (Error code(s): D02): If field 22A of sequence A is one of AMND and CANC, then field 21 is mandatory in that sequence. Otherwise, field 21 is optional.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 22A of sequence A is one of AMND and CANC, then field 21 is mandatory in that sequence. Otherwise, field 21 is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C18
fieldvalidation.comment:
C18: The broker identification must be present when the message is sent by a money broker. The brokerage can only be used in the case of a money broker confirmation. Thus, the presence of fields 88a and 71F in sequence N and therefore, the presence of sequence N itself, depend on field 94A in sequence A as follows (Error code(s): D74):
If either field 94A of sequence A is not present or field 94A is one of AGNT and BILA, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence N is optional. b) Field 88a of sequence N is optional. c) Field 71F of sequence N is not allowed.
If field 94A of sequence A is BROK, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence N is mandatory. b) Field 88a of sequence N is mandatory. c) Field 71F of sequence N is optional.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If either field 94A of sequence A is not present or field 94A is one of AGNT and BILA, then the following conditions apply: a) Sequence N is optional, b) Field 88a of sequence N is optional and c) Field 71F of sequence N is not allowed. Otherwise (if field 94A of sequence A is BROK), the following conditions apply: a) Sequence N is mandatory, b) Field 88a of sequence N is mandatory and c) Field 71F of sequence N is optional."

fieldvalidation.name: C19-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A in sequence A is CAPBUYER, then in sequence C, field 37J is mandatory and field 37L is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C19-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A in sequence A is CAPSELLER, then in sequence F, field 37J is mandatory and field 37L is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C19-3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A in sequence A is FLOORBUYER, then in sequence C, field 37J is not allowed and field 37L is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C19-4
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A in sequence A is FLOORSLLER, then in sequence F, field 37J is not allowed and field 37L is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C19-5
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If both sequences C and F are present and if subfield 'Type of Swap' of field 23A in sequence A is one of COLLARBYER and COLLARSLLR, then the following conditions apply: a) In each sequence C and F, a minimum of one field 37J or 37L must be present and b) If only one letter option is present in the first sequence, then the other letter option must be present in the second sequence."

fieldvalidation.name: C21
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence O, field 15O may not be the only field, that is, if field 15O is present, then at least one of the other fields of sequence O must be present (Error code(s): C98)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 360. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the year (its last two characters) and month of the termination date in field 30P, in the format YYMM (Error code(s): T22)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FN-29A-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "At least one of the following codes should be used: /DEPT/ followed by the name of the department, /FAXT/ followed by fax number, /NAME/ followed by the name of the contact person, /PHON/ followed by the telephone number, /TELX/ followed by the telex number."

fieldvalidation.name: FB1-18Ap-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30F (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB1-18Af-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 22B (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FC1-18Ap-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30F (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FC1-18Af-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 22B (Error code(s): D96). "

fieldvalidation.name: FC2-18A-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30X (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FE1-18Ap-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30F (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FE1-18Af-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 22B (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FF1-18Ap-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30F (Error code(s): D96). "

fieldvalidation.name: FF1-18Af-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 22B (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FF2-18A-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30X (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FH-18Ad-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30G (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FH-18Af-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 22B (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FL-18Ap-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent fields 22E (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FL-18Af-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 22B (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FM-18Ap-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent fields 22E (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: FM-18Af-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 22B (Error code(s): D96)."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-C Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code"

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."
